mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reports (reporter_id, reported_user_id, report_type, reason, status) VALUES (#{reporterId}, #{reportedUserId}, #{reportType}, #{reason}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reports WHERE reporter_id = #{reporterId} AND reported_user_id = #{reportedUserId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reports WHERE reporter_id = #{userId} OR reported_user_id = #{userId}
